ygData.subject: Re: spell changes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Slaver can be had. We were once there: 1 level 8 magician 1 level 7 druid 1 level 7 rogue 1 level 9 warrior We could tackle one slaver without too much
ygData.messageBody:
According to Wizard:
> Whow cleric is just great to have in group if you find any other you can go
> to area just before slavers huts and hunt things there (DONT HIT SLAVERS
> until with strong group) and you can hit orcs wich respawn near mountain

Slaver can be had. We were once there:
1 level 8 magician
1 level 7 druid
1 level 7 rogue
1 level 9 warrior

We could tackle one slaver without too much problem. Nearly died when two
slavers spawned at the same time. But we were working great together, and
the magician leader was very experienced and able.

--
